lead_paragraph: IVANOVA--Elena (Prodanov), 69, passed away in Naples, FL on June 1, 2016. Upon fleeing communist Bulgaria Elena embraced American lifestyle receiving degrees in architecture, accounting and law (Rutgers) while running family-owned gas stations and auto parts stores. She worked as an accountant at Deloitte Touche and retired as Senior ERISA Counsel at The New York Times. An artist, sports enthusiast, seamstress, belly dancer, gourmet chef and creative soul: Elena loved life! She is survived by her loving husband, James; sister, Petia; daughter, Margaret; son, Peter; niece, Milena; and five grandchildren and two grandnephews. Memorial to be held June 21, 2016 in Naples, FL. In lieu of flowers, please donate to CurePSP. To offer condolences or personal comments, please visit www.theelena.com. 1/3
